issue.title: [Rust] Review APIs for safety
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2417](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2417). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Rust library makes a lot of use of unsafe calls. We should review the API to see if any methods we expose should be marked unsafe or whether we need to add assertions to make APIs safe.

We should also add more unit tests around this.
